title: Singletracks Names Roanoke as one of the best Mountain Bike Towns
subtitle: Over 75 miles of singletrack in town, and 200+ miles in a 30 minute radius
description: With the Blue Ridge Mountains rising up sharply to the west of town, not only is there some 200 miles of bike-legal singletrack near Roanoke, but those miles offer true mountain biking.
keywords: roanoke, va, virginia, mountain biking, mtb, singletracks, trails, trail, biking, cycling, backcountry, backwoods
